definition[0]: if liquid slops somewhere, it moves around or over the edge of a container in an uncontrolled way
example[0]: Coffee slopped over the rim of her cup.
example[1]: With each wave, more water slopped into the cabin.
definition[1]: to put a liquid somewhere in a careless way
example[2]: She put the glass down, slopping beer onto the table.
definition[3]: waste food that can be used to feed animals
example[3]: Prisoners had to use slop buckets at night.
definition[5]: food that is too soft and tastes bad
example[4]: Do you actually expect us to eat this slop?
